schema.title: CW20 Staking
schema.description: Stake CW20 tokens and get up to 10 coins as rewards.

additional_rewards.description: Any rewards in addition to the staking token. This list cannot include the staking token.

items.description:
Represents the type of an fungible asset

Each **asset info** instance can be one of two variants:

- CW20 tokens. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the contract address. - Native SDK coins. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the denomination.

additional_rewards.title: additional_rewards

staking_token.description: The cw20 token that can be staked.

identifier.description: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in a app.
